short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically scrolls through YouTube Shorts videos, providing a hands-free viewing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of manually swiping through endless YouTube Shorts? 
This extension automatically scrolls to the next short video when the current one ends, allowing you to enjoy a seamless, hands-free viewing experience.

Key Features:
Automatic Scrolling: 
Effortlessly watch YouTube Shorts without needing to swipe or click.
Seamless Transition: The extension smoothly scrolls to the next video as soon as the current one finishes.

Hands-Free Viewing: 
Enjoy a continuous stream of short videos without any manual interaction.
Lightweight and Efficient: The extension is designed to be lightweight and efficient, ensuring it doesn't slow down your browsing experience.

Easy to Use: Simply install the extension, and it will automatically start working on YouTube Shorts pages.

No Configuration Required: The extension works out of the box with no settings or configurations needed.

How to Use:
Install the "YouTube Shorts Auto Scroll" extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Navigate to YouTube Shorts.

The extension will automatically start scrolling to the next video when the current one ends.
Why Use This Extension?
This extension is perfect for anyone who enjoys watching YouTube Shorts and wants a more convenient, hands-free experience. Whether you're multitasking, relaxing, or just want to binge-watch without interruption, this extension makes it easy to enjoy a continuous stream of short videos.

Privacy:
This extension does not collect any personal information or browsing data. It only interacts with YouTube Shorts pages to enable auto-scrolling.

Support:
If you encounter any issues or have suggestions, please feel free to contact us. nathan4dev@gmail.com
